    public class ClientHumanizedMessage
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel
    Class to generate an humanized message Popup in client side
    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientHumanizedMessage

        public ClientHumanizedMessage(java.lang.String message,
                      ClientHumanizedMessage.MESSAGE_TYPE messageType,
                      ClientHumanizedMessage.HIDE_BEHAVIOR hideBehavior)
        Constructor for client humanized message
        Parameters:
        message - Text to show inside the humanized message
        messageType - Type of message to show. Can be INFO, WARNING, ERROR.
        hideBehavior - Behaviour the popup has. Can be ON_CLICK, ON_CLICK_FADE, SHOW_AND_FADE, FADE_AFTER_MOUSE_MOVE.
